planSummary: Emma Wilson lives in Flat 3B on the 3rd floor. In the event of a fire alarm, Emma should evacuate via the east stairwell with her buddy (neighbour, Flat 3C). Emma uses a walking stick and may need assistance on stairs.

routes.name: Primary
routes.pathDescription: Exit flat; turn right; proceed to east stairwell (20m); descend stairs (3 floors); exit building via main entrance; proceed to Assembly Point (front courtyard).

evacuationProcedure.instruction: On hearing fire alarm, remain calm. Collect walking stick, mobile phone, and keys.
Exit flat and knock on neighbour's door (Flat 3C) for buddy assistance if available.
Proceed to east stairwell; descend stairs carefully, holding handrail.
Exit building via main entrance; go to Assembly Point in front courtyard.
